name: Icon Services Data
summary: An ISDATA file is a cache file created and used by macOS icon services. It contains cached icon data, which macOS uses to load icons more quickly. ISDATA files' filenames always consist of a UUID (such as 1AEDA0FE-C8DB-52F8-3A88-57A134262EB1 ) followed by the .isdata extension.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: ISDATA file open in Apple TextEdit
images.alt: ISDATA file open in Apple TextEdit
